tool.name: OGS: Vtu2Grid
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'Vtu2Grid'.
tool.command: Vtu2Grid #if str($cellsize_z): --cellsize-z '$cellsize_z' #end if #if str($cellsize_y): --cellsize-y '$cellsize_y' #end if #if str($cellsize_x): --cellsize-x '$cellsize_x' #end if #for $f in $input: --input '$f' #end for --output output_1.vtu

param.name: cellsize_z
param.label: cellsize z
param.help: edge length of cubes in z-direction

param.name: cellsize_y
param.label: cellsize y
param.help: edge length of cubes in y-direction

param.name: cellsize_x
param.label: cellsize x
param.help: edge length of cubes in x-direction (longitude) or all directions, if

tool.help: This tool runs the **Vtu2Grid** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
